title: Banner of command is fantastic fun
body:
(At my elo it's borderline OP.) Here in the Bronze V MMR Unranked elo, at 20/25 minutes both teams decide that the only thing that can possibly be correct is to constantly and permanently group up mid. Did you just take mid inhib? Better 5 man mid instead of taking down toplane which has a massive minion wave while mid shoves itself. Minions going to take our bot tower/inhib? Who cares! Push mid! Enter Banner of Command, savior of the Bronze V MMR unranked players like me out there. Put a promotion on a siege minion on one of the side lanes and you are practically guaranteed to take a tower without doing anything else, and gain a crum load of gold while you're at it. 

Plus it's hilarious watching a Ziggs try to kill the promoted minion and then reporting you for hacking when the minion doesn't get hurt by the bombs XD
Long and short I love building the item even if it's not actually that fantastic. It gets you a lot of gold as a support, provides great map pressure and I lol every time my super minion takes a tower. 
Thanks for reading, have a wonderful day!

replies.body:
> Plus it's hilarious watching a Ziggs try to kill the promoted minion and then reporting you for hacking when the minion doesn't get hurt by the bombs XD

Poor Ziggs.  Sometimes it's hard to look at our VFX from the eyes of a less experienced player. To me it reads magic immune, but clearly not to that Ziggs. :(
I'm a fairly experienced player and I still will occasionally burn a spell or two before I realize it's immune. We all have a little bronze in us.
{{champion:31}} i tried to fking eat it -.-, this is why im silver
That doesn't work? His ult deals true damage so I would think it would still work.
immune to abilities i broke my teeths
Huh clearly the description on the Item should change, I think it just says immune to magic damage.
{{champion:115}} Needs more...explosions.
Where's the exclamation points

http://mckpr.com/upload/$RAPKPRH.jpg

Here they are
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I personally read "magic immune" because it's in the item tooltip.

And on the freaking minion when I hit it with magic damage.

>And on the freaking minion when I hit it with magic damage.

Really? Never knew this.
Despite building it all the time. (>_>)
wai!!!!!!???? PEople read items and champ skills on this game? maybe you guys should increase font size or try using bold letters {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Shh... {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Minions should laugh when they are hit with spells that deal magic damage.
Could be easy, put a Lux or Teemo laugh, they'll learn real quick. :D

Yeah but promoting damaged cannon minion and healing it up while quickly clearing nearest enemy wave is legit. Used to do that on Alistar.

That sounds like some DOTA shit
It's great seeing Azir try to kill a Banner of Command empowered minion. He has to actively move his soldiers away.
I can safely say that {{item:3060}} + {{item:3512}} on {{champion:432}} results in the most consistent fun I've experienced in this game.

This lane gets more/better minions, that lane gets more/better minions, EVERY lane gets more/better minions!
{{champion:432}} [bongs happily]
There was a thread where an azir as raging about a banner minion on all chat saying it was a glitch. Laughed so hard

I hate banner of command as corki.

I'm an ADC, and I still do no damage. :(
Never even thought of that. That's sad and awesome at the same time XD
Rush banner vs Veigar mid. You can deny him a lot of AP by making siege minions magic immune, give your allies resists in team fights, and generally belittle him.
banner combined with zz can do some awesome pushing and also allow you to stay in-game longer if your base is pushed ;) I love em.

The sad part it, also a legit way to 1v1.  Drop a Zz'Rot in the Far Brush (or in the River Brush if fearing a Gank), wait for the Enemy to dive into your Minion Wave to All In you (because it's Bronze, so wait long enough and some one WILL dive into your entire 100% HP Minion Wave to try you on for size) and Promote as he takes the Aggro.

You get a nice indicator when a Voidling suddenly goes Down River, and you get a Siege Minion blasting for some legit Damage with the rest of your Wave.

how 2 counter azir
1. buy banner of command
2. sit at mid lane bush and watch him try to kill the super minion
rush in with jungle {{champion:83}} & banner the pestilence ghoul...insane fun.
I miss the aura that was increasing minions damage  by 10-15% dont remember but it was Ã  core on my Zyra build{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I just saw this donger top rush banner and zz. He got Herald and then came mid, we caught one person and then got all 3 turrets and the inhib in one push.

I once built both on Yi.
It was one-for all, and I felt like dicking around and went tank support Yi.
The enemy Ekkos all build AP.
I held mid lane inhib turret for like 5 minutes by myself against 3-4 of them.
ah banner of command + ZZ
yea just sad we no longer have that item cdr mastery :(
Respect for dominion icon

i know but it used to be 20%

and you did not need an itemslot for it
A staple item on Taric :)

It has come to the point where I am shaping my champion pool around being able to use this item.
{{champion:111}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:40}} etc
heimerdinger + banner of command + zz'rot portal

banner of comand is boderline on y favorite item up against {{item:3512}} . nothing like being able to get 2 last hits on turrets, in a row (inner and inhib) with one empowered minion, as bard support
too bad most teams now are full ad

It was fun for me

BACK IN THE DAY MALZAHAR + BANNER OF COMMAND = OP

Especially if you went AD
